Summary: Observed a 5 light (4 red, 1 white leading) UFO, low in northern sky moving very slowly from east to west.
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Carrollton
There were no other sightings in Carrollton on or around March 19th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsAt 6:30AM Central Time, while facing north as I sat in my car at a stop light, I saw the slow moving chevron formation lights emerge from behind one landfill mound (about .10 mile away in front of me) until it passed behind the next mound further to the west in the landfill. At first, I thought it was just the usual air-traffic going in and out of DFW Airport and Love Field in downtown Dallas or maybe traffic helicopters, but this did not resemble any of those. These lights were enormous compared to the usual air-traffic and had very well defined edges, no halos. I watched for it to emerge again as I drove to the west and around to the north side of the landfill, but I didn't observe it again. Had it been everyday air-traffic, I would have surely seen it again as I circled the landfill site. So, I am just bewildered as to what it could have been.
